text1: You’re the kind of person even stars and moon would pause to admire.
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday, Payal! 💖 Wishing you all the happiness, love, and sunshine in the world — not just today, but every day ahead. You’re not only a wonderful soul but someone who brings warmth, positivity, and a spark wherever you go. You deserve nothing less than the best this world can offer — success that makes you proud, smiles that never fade, and moments that fill your heart with peace and joy.
text2: That's what i was going to do
text4: I realised i want to do somthing
wishText: Smile dekh rhe ho *Koi toh rokhlo*
outroText: Messages may fade from memory, but this link will always remind you of how breathtaking your smile is — one look, and the whole world lights up.
